items.sentence: We conduct safety inspections here on a regular basis.
We enjoyed seeing the city, but we got a little tired.
It\'s been three years since Tom and Mary got married.
It\'s been three years since Tom has been to visit us.

Tom is taller than any of the other kids in his class.

Tom has asked Mary to meet him at his office tomorrow.
